input_text:
Job Title: IaaS Engineer - Secret

Location: Virginia, MN

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Job#: 2024548

Job Description:

Title: IaaS Engineer

Location: Langley AFB, Hampton, VA

Duration: 1 year, possible extension

Clearance Requirement: Secret

Overview:

 Possess extensive experience as an engineer working in the cloud computing field that includes on-premise transition to cloud, hybrid cloud, and commercial cloud management. A mid to senior-level engineer capable of mentoring junior team members. Able to create, understand, and modify design diagrams of infrastructure service capabilities based on changing requirements. Able to convert user requirements into technical solutions and recommendations. Able to Support in the design of Kubernetes-based hosting infrastructure. Able to maintain currency on new and upcoming hybrid cloud-based technologies and service offerings, to merge into or replace existing services to meet ever-changing requirements. Able to provision, manage, and secure cloud infrastructure with expertise through technologies such as IaC, auto-scaling resource services, zero trust architecture, backup strategies, and hybrid cloud to on-premise native services. Able to Support in design and implementation of reliable, highly available, and secure infrastructure systems and services. Able to ensure Infrastructure Engineers follow designed implementations of systems using automation and IaC to ensure secure repeatable builds. Possess effective communication skills to interact with various stakeholders internal and external to the organization. Able to brief highly technical concepts and operations to teams of limited technical expertise and also to teams of highly specialized Infrastructure personnel.

Requirements:

 5+ years of demonstrated experience working as an engineer leveraging large-scale hybrid cloud infrastructure as their primary application platform. Experience with agile and lean software development practices, and supporting infrastructure used for hosting container-based services. Deep understanding of modern security best practices for cloud infrastructure and networks. Three-plus years of demonstrated experience building declarative infrastructure using modern IaC techniques. Resume demonstrates experience with scripting languages (PowerShell, JSON, and Python). Resume has at least one or more examples of successfully transforming large-scale software, data center, and/or on-premises infrastructure programs to a containerized cloud-native architecture. DoD IAT L2, must be able to obtain IAT L3 within six months, Industry recognized certification in technologies such as security, cloud computing, om prem computing, linux, VMW, etc

Nice to have:

 AWS Experience

EEO Employer
